name: US TAMIL POLITICAL ACTION COUNCIL
description: Advocacy on behalf of Tamil American community
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for H.Res. 442.  Supporting language regarding Sri Lanka in FY2020 House and Senate Appropriations Bills, and advocating on behalf of human rights and religious freedom in Sri Lanka.
